args.content:
import Mathlib

open Set Topology

/-- The closed interval X = [0,1] as a subtype of ‚Ñù. -/
def X := { t : ‚Ñù // 0 ‚â§ t ‚àß t ‚â§ 1 }

/-- The endpoints as elements of X. -/
def X_zero : X := ‚ü®0, by norm_num‚ü©
def X_one  : X := ‚ü®1, by norm_num‚ü©

/-- Equivalence relation on X identifying the two endpoints 0 and 1. -/
def rel (x y : X) : Prop := x = y ‚à® ((x.1 = 0 ‚à® x.1 = 1) ‚àß (y.1 = 0 ‚à® y.1 = 1))

lemma rel_refl : Reflexive rel := fun x => Or.inl rfl

lemma rel_symm : Symmetric rel := by
  intro x y h
  cases h
  ¬∑ exact Or.inl h.symm
  ¬∑ rcases h with ‚ü®hx, hy‚ü©
    exact Or.inr ‚ü®hy, hx‚ü©

lemma rel_trans : Transitive rel := by
  intro x y z hxy hyz
  cases hxy
  ¬∑ -- x = y
    cases hyz
    ¬∑ -- y = z
      exact Or.inl (hxy.trans hyz)
    ¬∑ -- y in {0,1} and z in {0,1}
      rcases hyz with ‚ü®hy‚ÇÄ, hz‚ÇÄ‚ü©
      have : (x.1 = 0 ‚à® x.1 = 1) := by rwa [‚Üêhxy]
      exact Or.inr ‚ü®this, hz‚ÇÄ‚ü©
  ¬∑ -- x in {0,1} and y in {0,1}
    rcases hxy with ‚ü®hx‚ÇÄ, hy‚ÇÄ‚ü©
    cases hyz
    ¬∑ -- y = z
      have : (z.1 = 0 ‚à® z.1 = 1) := by rwa [hyz]
      exact Or.inr ‚ü®hx‚ÇÄ, this‚ü©
    ¬∑ -- y in {0,1} and z in {0,1}
      rcases hyz with ‚ü®hy'‚ÇÄ, hz‚ÇÄ‚ü©
      exact Or.inr ‚ü®hx‚ÇÄ, hz‚ÇÄ‚ü©

lemma rel_iseqv : Equivalence rel := ‚ü®rel_refl, rel_symm, rel_trans‚ü©

/-- The map f : X ‚Üí ‚Ñù √ó ‚Ñù sending t to (cos(2œÄt), sin(2œÄt)). -/
def f (t : X) : ‚Ñù √ó ‚Ñù :=
  (Real.cos (2 * Real.pi * t.1), Real.sin (2 * Real.pi * t.1))

/-- The quotient of X identifying 0 and 1 is homeomorphic to the image of f (the unit circle). -/
theorem quotient_ident_01_homeo_circle :
  Homeomorph (Quotient (Setoid.mk rel rel_iseqv)) (Set.range f) := by
  -- proof omitted
  sorry
